sentence.text: The first and most important question to mull over as you gaze at your patch is : What is this garden for ?
As it was she stored his words to mull over in her room .
` We 're mulling over ideas , " it said .
That left Pitcher undefeated on 32 and the Light Blues to mull over a 133-run defeat that might have been much more comprehensive .
She left him , having found out what she wanted to know , and took her own bus home , mulling over her good idea .
It is better by far for the patient to have a week or so in which to mull over all that has occurred and everything he or she has learnt about the past .
On his morning run along the Embankment , Adam mulled over the tasks that still needed to be carried out next .
He was pacing back and forth , mulling over what he would say to her , when the biology student knocked at his door for the loan of a shilling for the gas-meter .
Fortunately , Creed was too motivated by sell-preservation to mull over the situation , although he definitely paused and it was dramatic .
We spent hours mulling over maps and descriptions of countries .
Barney appeared to be mulling over what he had just learned ; several times he looked searchingly at Melissa across the table .
She mulled over what the object might be .
Take all the time you need to mull over a plan or proposal , do n't let anyone pressurise you into snap decisions .
Gwendolen was outraged , having mulled over Angelina 's earlier words .
At first she tended to listen and take in what was said in order to mull over it in the quiet of her own bed .
In addition , there are also certain to be one or two early mistakes which will need rectifying , and plans to be mulled over for next spring 's display .
She pretended to be mulling it over .
Perhaps , once you have had a chance to mull this one over , could you please telephone me at the home number above ?
For some days he had been mulling this over , trying to come up with something more interesting than Wyvis Hall .
There would be no slipping away here , no going to ground to mull things over .
Even so , she would still like to mull the thing over with Bridget .
The more Jane Holt mulled things over in her mind , the less cause there seemed to be for alarm .
Put down that Gameboy and your copy of Madonna 's Sex , clean up the mess , pour yourself a pale cream sherry and mull over the year that 's drawing to a close .
